text_block_list.text: To increase her abilities even more, Taiki Shuttle is attending Summer Training Camp.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Haaa… haaa… and, Goal!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… fuuu. With this, am I finished with training?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay! Truth is, there's something I want to do together.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: When it comes to training camp… there's also barbeques! I've been really, really looking forward to it because of that!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I was so excited that I looked up some things on the net! There's lots of delicious things to be found in nature!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why-… let's find some really fresh ingredients, and have a barbeque!
Since training's over, she should probably be resting now, but… Taiki Shuttle was gazing at me with eyes filled with expectations.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fuooooo~~! Good! Thank you! Let's get going then!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Funfunfuuun!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Looking right and looking left. If this is the place, then there should be mushrooms around here.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: They should be way more fresh than the ones sold in stores. Let's look for the ultimate mushrooms!
choice_data_list: Be careful of ones with poison-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Aaaaahhh?! Trainer-san! Look at this!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Red with white dots…! Don't tell me, if you eat these you'll become giant like those legendary mushrooms?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, keep your eyes opened too! Do you want to eat these? Okay! Let's get them!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Poison?! Oh… they're so cool though, that's too bad…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ah! How about those? They're rainbow-colored and look so tasty!
…maybe she just wanted to go gather mushrooms. Taiki Shuttle was in high spirits and when I followed after her-
…at some point we ended up at the beach.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh! Trainer-san! It's the ocean! When you think of the ocean you think of… shellfish! Sea urchin! Let's go!
Before I could stop her, Taiki Shuttle ran towards the ocean!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fuu~! I found a lot of shellfish! Trainer-san's favorites are probably mixed in too!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Alright, please follow me!
Even though it's summer, if she's this soaked she might still catch a cold…
choice_data_list: Wouldn't it be easier to just buy some…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: No! These are fresh, you know! Fresh! I want the tastiest ones!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's keep hunting! Here we go!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wow! Trainer-san, it's a field! There's lots of treasures here! Japan's vegetables are tasty so I love them!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Looks like there's an old man working there right now. Let's see if he'll share some with us if we help him out!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Let's go! Go go goooo!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: And, heave-ho!… Fuo. Old man! With this, we've finished pulling all the weeds!

text_block_list.name: Elder Farmer
text_block_list.text: Oh yeah! Both of you, thanks for helping. As promised, take whichever vegetables you'd like.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaah! Thank you!…fufu! Trainer-san, which vegetables should we pick?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Once we choose these~…we'll finally be ready for the finale!
choice_data_list: Starting prep for a barbeque now is…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: No problem! Leave it to me! C'mon, Trainer-san! Hurry up!
With Taiki Shuttle hurrying me, we chose some vegetables. And then what awaited was-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Welcome to a Happy Barbeque Party—!!
On the beach, probably borrowed from the training camp facilities, there was a barbeque set already prepared…!
choice_data_list: W-when did you set this up?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Truth is, I woke up early to get prepared!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why, I was glad you didn't say [No] when I asked you to come with me.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: We were able to safely gather all the ingredients so, it'll definitely be an especially tasty barbeque!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Please accept this hospitality from me!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, Trainer-san, thank you for helping me!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: …whenever I'm feeling lonely and sad. You're always there for me, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why, even if my family isn't here, everyday I'm full of smiles!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: And that's why, I realized. To me, Trainer-san is definitely-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: My important, "Japanese Family"!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why, I'm treating you to the barbeque my family in America loves, so Trainer-san can learn about it too!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fufu, yes! My surprise was a success!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Alright! Trainer-san, what do you want to eat first? Leave the service to me!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: These ingredients are all for you, Trainer-san! These are all here so Trainer-san can eat them!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'll put my heart in to cooking these for you. Please eat your fill!
Taiki Shuttle's barbeque filled not only my stomach, but my heart as well.
